sentences.sContent: So they've said that passing trade bills with South Korea and Panama and Colombia would help spur growth -- those got done, with significant bipartisan support.
sentences.sContent_eng: So they've said that passing trade bills with South Korea and Panama and Colombia would help spur growth -- those got done, with significant bipartisan support.
sentences.sCn: 所以他们已经说过了，通过贸易法案与南韩和巴拿马和哥伦比亚将有助于刺激增长——那些搞，重要的两党支持。

remMethod.val: 美国NBA 2003赛季总冠军为马刺队(Spurs)

trans.tranOther: a sharp pointed object on the heel of a rider’s boot which is used to encourage a horse to go faster

trans.tranCn: 刺激， 鞭策， 激励
trans.tranOther: to encourage someone or make them want to do something
